name: javacript-introduction
description: --- title: Introduction to React.js type: lesson duration: "1:30" creator:     name: James Traver     city: CHI competencies: Programming, Front-end Frameworks, React, JSX ---
author: James Traver, Colt Borg

scripts.build-docs: cat CHANGELOG.md >> README.md && node_modules/.bin/jsdoc src/ -d docs/ -t node_modules/docdash/ --readme README.md
scripts.test-coverage: npm run test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov && codecov
